evidence.claim: OmniSYS utilizes AWS for cloud services including serverless computing and data storage.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations ensuring the confidentiality of health data.
OmniSYS supports the X12 standard for electronic health transactions, integral for billing and claims processing.
Reports indicate that OmniSYS utilizes HL7 and FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration patterns for data handling are outlined, highlighting the use of APIs and cloud services.

icp.icp_reason: Handles X12 transactions and offers API solutions for healthcare data exchange.
